伏.definition: to lean over; to fall (go down); to hide (in ambush); to conceal oneself; to lie low; hottest days of summer; to submit; to concede defeat; to overcome; to subdue; volt

伏安.definition: volt-ampere (measure of apparent power in alternating current circuits)

伏惟.definition: to lie prostrate; to prostrate oneself (in veneration)

伏案.definition: to bend over one's desk (writing, studying, taking a nap etc)

伏爾加格勒.definition: Volgograd, Russian city on the Volga River 伏爾加河|伏尔加河[Fu2 er3 jia1 He2]

伏牛山.definition: Funiu mountain range in southwest Henan, an eastern extension of Qinling range 秦嶺山脈|秦岭山脉[Qin2 ling3 shan1 mai4], Shaanxi

伏筆.definition: foreshadowing (literary device); foretaste of material to come (in an essay or story)

伏羅希洛夫.definition: Kliment Voroshilov (1881-1969), Soviet politician and military commander

伏羲.definition: Fuxi, legendary Chinese emperor, trad. 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping and writing

伏羲氏.definition: Fuxi or Fu Hsi, legendary Chinese emperor 2852-2738 BC, mythical creator of fishing, trapping, and writing

伏臥.definition: lying down; to lie prostrate; prone

伏虎.definition: to subdue a tiger; fig. to prevail over sinister forces

伏輸.definition: variant of 服輸|服输[fu2 shu1]

伏辯.definition: variant of 服辯|服辩[fu2 bian4]
